A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The franchise obviously has a recipe they are sticking to.. TLJ is a mix between Episode 4 and Episode 5. Same roles\, different characters\, with a little twist. I enjoyed the movie but felt that it was unfinished. There were a lot of things introduced that deserved more attention and depth. Additionally\, this movie will be the gateway drug to more of the content from third party novels\, particularly with Leia. Some VERY big steps were taken plot and cast-wise.
